summary: "Thor: Ragnarok" is a 2017 superhero movie about the Marvel Comics character Thor. It's the third Thor movie and the 17th in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Thor must escape the planet Sakaar to save his home, Asgard, from destruction by the villain Hela. The film stars Chris Hemsworth as Thor and was directed by Taika Waititi. It was praised for its humor, action, and visual effects, and made a lot of money worldwide. A sequel, "Thor: Love and Thunder," came out in 2022.
title: Thor Ragnarok
